description:
Senior full stack developer
This position will play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining our SaaS product, an accounting software for non-accountant.

Key Responsibilities:
Design the full stack system flow
Hands on development from concept to deployment
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Stay up-to-date with the best use of AI models and deployment

Qualifications:
-Knowledgeable in deployment of AI into the system.Â  (e.g. User prompting, parsing scanned document data into forms, reading bank statement and predictive text)
-Showcase the projects you have built.
-Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role.
-Strong in React, Typescript, tRPC, Supabase.
-Familiar with Cloudflare and AWS.

Benefits:
Salary payment can be made in USDT
Small team of 3 people (No bureaucracies)
Full remote.

We are at the iteration stage and this position will need to make a lot of major decision for the company.



Please mention the word **ELECTRIFY** and tag RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA== when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA==). This is a beta feature to avoid spam applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this and see they're human.
